title: The Peerless Mature Hitman Wants To Live Quietly With His Daughters
alternative_title: 無双の熟年ヒットマンは、娘たちと静かに暮らしたい
status: 無双の熟年ヒットマンは、娘たちと静かに暮らしたい
description:
Description :
        Harland Defense is an older man. He holds the title of the world’s one and only Risk Rarity 8 individual, and that’s not all: he’s also a peerless hit man who possesses extraordinary strength. He is employed by national governments and the big shots who run the world, and as soon as he receives his weapon from a girl known as “Mourning Dress,” he completes every job with the utmost degree of care and perfection.All he wants is to create a world free of crime.However, the so-called strongest hit man had one small weakness… There’s a group of peaceful girls with unfortunate circumstances living in the apartment building that Harland manages? A peerless older man with two sides: his ordinary life together with beautiful girls who have troubled pasts, and his life as a hit man! Presenting a brand-new colored comic series by Kazuma Kamachi, the author of “A Certain Magical Index” and “A Certain Scientific Railgun”!---**Links:**- (https://hykecomic.com/sample/%E7%84%A1%E5%8F%8C%E3%81%AE%E7%86%9F%E5%B9%B4%E3%83%92%E3%83%83%E3%83%88%E3%83%9E%E3%83%B3%E3%81%AF%E3%80%81%E5%A8%98%E3%81%9F%E3%81%A1%E3%81%A8%E9%9D%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AB%E6%9A%AE%E3%82%89%E3%81%97)
